name: AWcode Toolkit
author: AWcode

sections.description:
A collection of useful tools & functions for WordPress site owners.

General Features

  • Support Cloudflare Flexible SSL

  • Maintenence mode

  • Coming soon mode

  • Database find and replace

WooCommerce Features

  • Per product Sales Count

  • Per User Sales Count

  • Order UTM TrackingA collection of useful tools & functions for WordPress site owners.

General Features

  • Support Cloudflare Flexible SSL

  • Maintenence mode

  • Coming soon mode

  • Database find and replace

WooCommerce Features

  • Per product Sales Count

  • Per User Sales Count

  • Order UTM Tracking
sections.installation:
1. Unzip awtoolkit.zip and upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. The plugin is now active, you can manage options on the Settings page1. Unzip awtoolkit.zip and upload the folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  4. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  5. The plugin is now active, you can manage options on the Settings page
sections.faq:
Who should install our plugin

Anyone who runs a website built on WordPress.= Who should install our plugin =
